official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the Senate from April 18, 1973 to April 30, 1973, and the adjournment of the House from April 19, to April 30, 1973.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that when the Senate adjourns on Wednesday, April 18, 1973, it stand adjourned until 12 o'clock meridian, Monday, April 30, 1973, and that when the House adjourns on Thursday, April 19, 1973, it stand adjourned until 12 o'clock meridian, Monday, April 30, 1973.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the Senate from April 18, 1973 to April 30, 1973, and the adjournment of the House from April 19, to April 30, 1973.
